榤字的基本解释

榤
jié
古同“桀”，木桩，亦指鸡栖息的木桩。

榤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》渠列切，入薛，羣。］
同“桀1”。
木桩。也指鸡栖息的木桩。

榤字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榤； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页543第33
【唐韻】【集韻】?渠列切，音傑。【玉篇】杙也。【爾雅·釋宮】雞棲于杙爲榤。【毛詩】作桀。詳桀字註。

榤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
榤字的起名意思

木桩。也指鸡栖息的木桩。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
jié
In ancient times, "Jie", wooden stake, also refers to the wooden stake on which chickens perched.
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guang Yun" Qu Lie cut, into Xue, group. ]
Same as "Jie 1".
Wooden stakes. Also refers to the wooden stake on which the chicken perches.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榤; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 543 33
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qu Lieqie, Yinjie. [Jade articles] Yeah. 【Erya·Shigong】The chicken roosts in the 杙榤. [Mao Poems] Make Jie. Detailed note of Jie.
